attributes.action: Stop children & families having to go abroad for treatment.
attributes.additional_details:
We need to stop families with very poorly children having to go abroad for treatment, there should be the medical expertise here in the UK.
If a child has to go abroad for treatment then the government should assist parents with funding rather than leave the burden to parents, the stress of having a very sick child as well as having to raise tens of thousands of pounds is morally and ethically wrong.
